member.name: T:Ipify.GeoIp
member.summary: Represent the class containing IP Geolocation Datas

member.name: T:Ipify.IpifyGeoIp
member.summary: Represent the static class for making call to Ipiy API to obtain IP Address Geolocation Data from Ipify

member.name: T:Ipify.IpifyIp
member.summary: Represent static class of IP address Request Sync/Async

member.name: M:Ipify.IpifyIp.GetPublicIpAsync(System.Boolean)
member.param: Choose between secure request and unsecure (https/http) by default set as secure
member.returns: Return public IP Address as a string.

member.name: M:Ipify.IpifyIp.GetPublicIp(System.Boolean)
member.param: Choose between secure request and unsecure (https/http) by default set as secure
member.returns: Return public IP Address as a string.

member.name: M:Ipify.IpifyIp.GetPublicIpV6(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Request Public IP Address (v6) try to get IP Address as IPV6.
member.param: Choose between secure request and unsecure (https/http) by default set as secure
member.returns: Return public IP Address(v6) as a string, if don't will return IPv4 address as string

member.name: M:Ipify.IpifyIp.GetPublicIpV6Async(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Asyn Request Public IP Address (v6) try to get IP Address as IPV6.
member.param: Choose between secure request and unsecure (https/http) by default set as secure
member.returns: Return public IP Address(v6) as a string, if don't will return IPv4 address as string
